price: And say, “My Lord, I seek refuge with You from the temptations of the devils.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
